metadata.Title: CVE-2020-0347 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - low
metadata.Description: In iptables, there is a possible out of bounds write due to an incorrectbounds check. This could lead to local escalation of privilege with Systemexecution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed forexploitation.Product: AndroidVersions: Android-11Android ID: A-136658008

criterions.comment: iptables: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
